1131150.name: Hookbots - Soundtrack
1131150.description:
What's that? You want to be reminded of the fun and mayhem of Hookbots wherever you go?! Great!
The Hookbots Original Soundtrack is for you!

13 tracks of manic fun await you in this colourful album, composed and produced by Benedict Nichols and performed by the bots themselves. Apart from Ultima, he wouldn’t join in.

It includes the main theme, music from all the stages, and the track “Congratulations!” - usually heard only by those that make it through the Hookbot gauntlet. So, choose your ultimate, build your bot, challenge your friends/enemies, and get hooking!

Track List:

01. Congratulations!
02. Egg Theft
03. Power Plants
04. Forest Plains
05. Junkyard
06. King Of The Ring
07. Old Tree
08. Snowy Tops
09. Sporty Time
10. The Dark Towers
11. The Underground
12. Volcano
13. Main Theme
1131150.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 法语
